overview:
Andrew Rowe has 25 years of progressive experience in leading growth-oriented businesses in the healthcare, technology and industrial sectors. He joined AllMed in 2002.

Prior to that Mr. Rowe served as Executive Vice President, shareholder and Board member of Cascade General in Portland, Oregon. Under his leadership, the company grew from $44 million to over $110 million in average annual revenues. Prior to that, Mr. Rowe was Vice President at Adept Technology, a Silicon Valley start-up which grew to international leadership in factory automation robotics and software supplied to Fortune 500/Global 2000 manufacturers. He had P&L responsibility for more than $60 million in revenues and managed both domestic and international field operations. The company went through a successful IPO in 1995.
